definition: A condition experienced by individuals during a specific period of time, typically lasting around nine months, characterized by the development and growth of a new living being within the body. This term is commonly used to refer to the state of being pregnant.

examples.german: Sie freut sich auf die Schwangerschaft.
examples.english: She is looking forward to the pregnancy.

examples.german: Die Schwangerschaftsdauer beträgt etwa neun Monate.
examples.english: The duration of pregnancy is about nine months.

examples.german: Während der Schwangerschaft sollte man auf eine gesunde Ernährung achten.
examples.english: During pregnancy, one should pay attention to a healthy diet.
